title: $3800/3beds-2baths GORGEOUS HOUSE IN CASTRO VALLEY
posting_body: ['Beautiful and charming 2,500 sq.', 'ft. single family home has 3 Large bedrooms, 2 full baths.', 'Unique living room plus large Dining Room and large sunroom.', ' Castro Valley Unified School District.', 'Within walking distance to Proctor Elementary School and Castro Valley High School.', 'Close to down town Castro Valley shops and restaurants.', 'easy access to 580 and 880 freeways', 'FEATURES:', '-3 Bedroom, 2 bath', '-Spacious bedrooms', '-Gated entry with large yard and long driveway', '-Central heat', '-built in outdoor BBQ grill', '-Large bedrooms', '-Hardwood floors throughout', '-Sunroom/atrium', '-Dishwasher', '-Washer and dryer hook-up', 'NEARBY:', '-Proctor Elementary School', '-Creekside Middle School', '-Castro Valley High School', '-Close to Bart & I-580', 'TERMS:', '-One Year lease minimum', '-Rent $3,800 per month', '-Security deposit $4,500', '-Cleaning deposit $500', "-Tenant pays: all utilities, trash and renter's ins.", 'policy', 'REQUIREMENTS:', "-ID or Driver's License", '-Good credit only with income 3 times rent and a good rental history.', 'Credit check required for all applicants.', '-One year lease minimum', '-NO PETS', '-NO SMOKING', '-NO DRUGS', '-NO EVICTION HISTORY', '-$40 non refundable rental application fee for credit check', '-Available NOW', 'If interested, Please respond to the craigslist e-mail provided with some brief information about yourself and /or family size (job, income, credit).']
